BRIEF-Latin Resources Enters Term Sheet To Buy Electric Metals

Stock Markets 2 hours ago (Oct 27, 2019 20:14)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Latin Resources Enters Term Sheet To Buy Electric Metals Oct 24 (Reuters) - Latin Resources Ltd : * ENTERED INTO A CONDITIONAL BINDING TERMS SHEET TO ACQUIRE ELECTRIC METALS * CONDUCTING A SHARE PLACEMENT, CONVERTIBLE NOTE ISSUE TO PROFESSIONAL, SOPHISTICATED INVESTORS AND A RIGHTS ISSUE * CONSIDERATION COMPRISES ISSUE OF 25 MILLION ORDINARY SHARES & 6.3 MILLION OPTIONS TO SUBSCRIBE FOR SHARES IN CO AT EXERCISE PRICE OF $0.012
